38 //
39 // BallsInBox is derived from the Environment base class. This class models
40 // obstacles as spheres to provide a simple demo.
41 //
43 
44 #include <fastrack/environment/balls_in_box.h>
45 
46 namespace fastrack {
47 namespace environment {
48 
49 // Derived classes must provide a collision checker which returns true if
50 // and only if the provided position is a valid collision-free configuration.
51 // Provide a separate collision check for each type of tracking error bound.
52 bool BallsInBox::IsValid(const Vector3d& position, const Box& bound) const {
53  if (!initialized_) {
54  ROS_WARN("%s: Tried to collision check an uninitialized BallsInBox.",
55  name_.c_str());
56  return false;
57  }
58 
59  if (position(0) < lower_(0) + bound.x ||
60  position(0) > upper_(0) - bound.x ||
61  position(1) < lower_(1) + bound.y ||
62  position(1) > upper_(1) - bound.y ||
63  position(2) < lower_(2) + bound.z ||
64  position(2) > upper_(2) - bound.z)
65  return false;
66 
67  // Check against each obstacle.
68  const Vector3d bound_vector(bound.x, bound.y, bound.z);
69 
70  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < centers_.size(); ii++) {
71  const Vector3d& p = centers_[ii];
72 
73  // Find closest point in the tracking bound to the obstacle center.
74  Vector3d closest_point;
75  for (size_t jj = 0; jj < 3; jj++) {
76  closest_point(jj) =
77  std::min(position(jj) + bound_vector(jj),
78  std::max(position(jj) - bound_vector(jj), p(jj)));
79  }
80 
81  // Check distance to closest point.
82  if ((closest_point - p).norm() <= radii_[ii])
83  return false;
84  }
85 
86  return true;
87 }
88 
89 // Derived classes must have some sort of visualization through RViz.
90 void BallsInBox::Visualize(const ros::Publisher& pub, const std::string& frame) const {
91  if (pub.getNumSubscribers() <= 0)
92  return;
93 
94  // Set up box marker.
95  visualization_msgs::Marker cube;
96  cube.ns = "cube";
97  cube.header.frame_id = frame;
98  cube.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
99  cube.id = 0;
100  cube.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::CUBE;
101  cube.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
102  cube.color.a = 0.5;
103  cube.color.r = 0.3;
104  cube.color.g = 0.7;
105  cube.color.b = 0.7;
106 
107  geometry_msgs::Point center;
108 
109  // Fill in center and scale.
110  cube.scale.x = upper_(0) - lower_(0);
111  center.x = lower_(0) + 0.5 * cube.scale.x;
112 
113  cube.scale.y = upper_(1) - lower_(1);
114  center.y = lower_(1) + 0.5 * cube.scale.y;
115 
116  cube.scale.z = upper_(2) - lower_(2);
117  center.z = lower_(2) + 0.5 * cube.scale.z;
118 
119  cube.pose.position = center;
120  cube.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
121  cube.pose.orientation.y = 0.0;
122  cube.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
123  cube.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
124 
125  // Publish cube marker.
126  pub.publish(cube);
127 
128  // Visualize obstacles as spheres.
129  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < centers_.size(); ii++){
130  visualization_msgs::Marker sphere;
131  sphere.ns = "sphere";
132  sphere.header.frame_id = frame;
133  sphere.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
134  sphere.id = static_cast<int>(ii);
135  sphere.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE;
136  sphere.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
137 
138  sphere.scale.x = 2.0 * radii_[ii];
139  sphere.scale.y = 2.0 * radii_[ii];
140  sphere.scale.z = 2.0 * radii_[ii];
141 
142  sphere.color.a = 0.9;
143  sphere.color.r = 0.7;
144  sphere.color.g = 0.5;
145  sphere.color.b = 0.5;
146 
147  geometry_msgs::Point p;
148  const Vector3d point = centers_[ii];
149  p.x = point(0);
150  p.y = point(1);
151  p.z = point(2);
152 
153  sphere.pose.position = p;
154 
155  // Publish sphere marker.
156  pub.publish(sphere);
157  }
158 }
159 
160 // Load parameters. This may be overridden by derived classes if needed
161 // (they should still call this one via Environment::LoadParameters).
162 bool BallsInBox::LoadParameters(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
163  if (!Environment::LoadParameters(n))
164  return false;
165 
166  ros::NodeHandle nl(n);
167 
168  // Number/size of obstacles.
169  int num; double min_radius, max_radius;
170  if (!nl.getParam("env/num_obstacles", num)) return false;
171  if (!nl.getParam("env/min_radius", min_radius)) return false;
172  if (!nl.getParam("env/max_radius", max_radius)) return false;
173 
174  // Random seed.
175  int seed;
176  if (!nl.getParam("env/seed", seed)) return false;
177 
178  // Generate obstacles.
179  GenerateObstacles(static_cast<size_t>(num), min_radius, max_radius, seed);
180 
181  return true;
182 }
183 
184 // Generate random obstacles.
185 void BallsInBox::GenerateObstacles(
186  size_t num, double min_radius, double max_radius, unsigned int seed) {
187  // Create a random number generator.
188  std::random_device rd;
189  std::default_random_engine rng(rd());
190  rng.seed(seed);
191 
192  // Set up x/y/z and radius distributions.
193  std::uniform_real_distribution<double> unif_x(lower_(0), upper_(0));
194  std::uniform_real_distribution<double> unif_y(lower_(1), upper_(1));
195  std::uniform_real_distribution<double> unif_z(lower_(2), upper_(2));
196  std::uniform_real_distribution<double> unif_r(min_radius, max_radius);
197 
198  // Create obstacles.
199  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < num; ii++) {
200  centers_.push_back(Vector3d(unif_x(rng), unif_y(rng), unif_z(rng)));
201  radii_.push_back(unif_r(rng));
202  }
203 }
204 
205 } //\namespace environment
206 } //\namespace fastrack
